name: Wozart
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off light”
”Alexa, set light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Wozart is a wireless connected home solution that enables control, monitoring & automation of home appliances & lights through voice & app interfaces from just about anywhere in the world. Wozart products are wireless, retrofittable & modular making it the perfect solution for a single appliance to complete home automation. Without having to go through expensive renovations or rewiring, getting your home automated with Wozart is as easy as it gets. 

Wozart products are built with a goal to enhance and simplify everyday human life while protecting the environment.

Instructions:
After enabling the Wozart skill, login with the same email account that was used in the Wozart mobile application. Ask Alexa to discover devices and your home is at your command.

In the smart home section of Amazon Alexa application, you can create groups and add devices to them.

Example: Consider a group named "Hall" with devices "Lamp" and "Light". The command "Turn on Hall" will turn on all the devices in the group hall.

Note:
This skill requires you to login with the same Email Account used with the Wozart mobile application. The login credentials will be used for the sole purpose of linking your account. 

This skill requires Wozart hardware devices.
